projects.title: SuiteSync
projects.description: SuiteSync is a comprehensive hotel management system designed to streamline daily operations, enhance guest experiences, and optimize administrative processes. It offers real-time booking management, seamless payment processing, and in-depth analytics. With an intuitive interface and automation capabilities, SuiteSync simplifies reservations, billing, and staff coordination, ensuring efficiency and improved customer satisfaction.
projects.outcome: SuiteSync delivers scalability and flexibility, enabling hotels of all sizes to adapt to dynamic demands. The system automates workflows to reduce manual effort, enhances job search and recruitment within the hospitality sector, and optimizes job postings for better visibility. Additionally, its data-driven insights empower hotels to make informed business decisions, ultimately improving operational efficiency and revenue growth.

projects.title: Todo List (Web App)
projects.description: Todo List Web App that stores and manages tasks using a JSON file as a database powered by JSON Server. It allows users to add, update, delete, and mark tasks as completed while persisting data in a simulated backend. The app is lightweight, fast, and ideal for learning API integration and local storage solutions.
projects.outcome: The To-Do List Web App enhances productivity by providing an intuitive and efficient task management system. Users can easily create, update, and track tasks, ensuring better organization and time management.
projects.challenge: Handling data persistence and avoiding loss of tasks on page refresh.
projects.solution: Used JSON Server as a local backend to store data persistently, ensuring tasks remain available even after a browser refresh.
